tool.name: STOCeps
tool.description: Annual variation and global trend by species from STOCeps.
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
========================== STOC eps ========================== **What it does**
***The STOCeps tool allows to generate 2 datasets :***
One presenting annual variation by species : * This file contains the outputs and its interpretations of the statistical model (glm abundance variations according to the square and the year) which makes it possible to see the inter-annual variations of abundance of the populations of birds for each species. It is thanks to these values that the graphic representations are realized.
Another with global trends by species : * This file contains the outputs and its interpretations of the statistical model which makes it possible to have the global tendency of the variation of abundance over the whole period of time of the considered species. The model used is the same as for inter-annual variations, but uses the years as a continuous variable.
